backend/main.mo: Defines types and in‑memory maps for budgets, expenses, histories, reminders, todos, notes, attendance, and user profiles, with authorization and approval APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI related features, impacted files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of multiple frontend files across state, layout, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining OKLCH variables, light/dark themes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script with branding and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring providers, navigation tabs, layout, and feature pages.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: Attendance editor UI allowing users to modify status, times, and notes with validation and save handling.
Renders a monthly attendance calendar with navigation, highlighting holidays, today, selected dates, and attendance entries.
Provides UI to select a date range and export attendance summaries as a PDF, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Holid: Allows admins to view, add, and delete holidays for the selected month with form dialogs and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Gates access based on authentication and approval status, offering an approval request flow for unapproved users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Prompts authenticated users without profiles to enter and save their name in a blocking setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/character/Armore: Displays a 3D character model with WebGL checks, error boundaries, and configurable animation.
frontend/src/components/character/Charac: Displays the 3D character with context-driven animations and a status label based on reminder activity.
Renders a fallback UI when the 3D character model fails to load, optionally showing an error message.
frontend/src/components/character/TripoC: Implements a procedural 3D character model with various animation states using react-three-fiber.
frontend/src/components/deskboard/ClockC: Provides a live clock and a monthly calendar view using formatted date and time data.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Catches application errors and displays a recovery UI with reset and reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Displays the app header with authentication controls, workbook upload handling, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main page layout with header, content area, character dock, footer, and reminder notifier.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSi: Renders a sidebar navigation menu with tooltips, supporting main, activity, and admin sections.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays in-app reminder notifications with optional sound playback and dismiss controls, reacting to reminder events.
frontend/src/components/reminders/TechHe: Renders a simple circular icon representing a user/avatar.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultRo: Modal allowing users to edit a table row's cell values and save or cancel changes.
frontend/src/components/search/ExploreHe: Shows inline Google search results in an iframe with fallback handling and options to open in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Displays sheet data in a scrollable table with headers, row numbering, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/table/Horizontal: Wrapper that adds horizontal scrolling support for wide table content.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Search bar for filtering update-checking results by keyword and match type with clear functionality.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and displays step-by-step VLOOKUP animation based on lookup parameters and dataset.
frontend/src/context/ReminderEventsConte: Context provider managing active reminder state and exposing methods to set or dismiss reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApproval.ts: Provides queries for checking caller approval/admin status and listing approvals via the backend actor.
Provides react-query mutations for requesting and setting user approval, validating identity and backend actor before calling backend methods and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Implements attendance-related queries and mutations including config fetch/save and daily check-in/out, with cache invalidation and identity/actor checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendanceCalendar: Fetches all attendance entries and converts them into calendar event objects with formatted status, time, and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEvents.ts: Stubbed hooks for fetching and mutating user-created calendar events, currently returning empty data and throwing errors because backend support is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useHolidays.ts: Provides queries and mutations for managing global holidays and checking admin status, updating holiday data and attendance summaries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInAppReminderNotif: Polls reminders periodically to trigger in-app notifications for due reminders and cleans up old notified entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity provider and hook for managing auth state, loading identities, logging in, and exposing identity status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityMutati: Provides React Query mutations for creating and modifying reminders, todos, and notes with authentication and actor checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityQuerie: Defines React Query hooks and mapping helpers to fetch reminders, todos, notes, and calendar events from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements history-related queries and mutations, including listing, filtering, adding, and clearing history records.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegularExpense.ts: Contains budget and expense queries and mutations with validation, identity checks, and automatic history logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides queries and mutations for retrieving and saving the current user's profile with actor and identity checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode themes, and macOS-inspired UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/attendancePd: Maps attendance summaries into tabular PDF export data and generates export filenames.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/dateRanges.t: Provides utilities to generate date ranges for week, month, year and format dates, durations, and timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/character/tabAnimationM: Defines animation types and maps tab IDs to animations with a helper to get the animation for a tab.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Compares two Excel sheets by key, row, or column to detect new, updated, or unchanged rows.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword matching across key and cell values with exact or contains mode.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Generates normalized row signatures and aligns old rows to new header order for comparison.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Normalizes, sanitizes, and searches Excel headers for consistent matching and indexing.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses Excel files into structured sheet data with sanitized headers.
Builds filtered expense report data, totals, and filenames for weekly, monthly, or yearly reports.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Defines branding config and utilities to load logos and watermarks as base64 or images for exports.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Loads jsPDF dynamically and generates branded landscape PDFs with headers, footers, and optional watermark.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and exports data to an Excel file with a branding header.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Defines company contact and footer details used for PDF export branding.
frontend/src/lib/notes/noteEncoding.ts: Encodes and decodes note title and content into a single backend text field using a separator.
frontend/src/lib/results/applyRowEdits.t: Applies edited row values onto a base dataset using a map of modified rows.
frontend/src/lib/results/exportFilters.t: Provides helpers to list filterable columns, unique column values, and filter rows by exact match.
frontend/src/lib/results/historyExport.t: Maps history entries into rows and exports them to Excel or PDF using existing export utilities.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements exact and approximate VLOOKUP over sheet data with multi-column return support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersTab.tsx: Renders an admin UI for viewing, approving, and rejecting user access requests with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/AttendanceTab.tsx: Implements the attendance management UI, including check-in/out handling, settings, calendar views, and summary retrieval via various hooks. Manages state for attendance configuration, calendar navigation, and editing entries.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarTab.tsx: Provides a combined calendar interface for user-created events and attendance overlays with CRUD support. Includes dialogs for adding events and authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/DeskboardTab.tsx: Implements the productivity dashboard with search, quick‑add reminders, todos, and notes, integrating multiple data queries and mutations. Also displays widgets like clock/calendar and an explore panel.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Displays user history entries with filtering, grouping, searching, and export to Excel/PDF. Supports clearing history and shows icons and badges by history type.
frontend/src/pages/NotesTab.tsx: Provides note‑taking UI with create/delete actions, authentication checks, and error handling. Notes are displayed sorted by last updated and created through a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/RegularExpenseTab.tsx: Manages budget limits and regular expenses with add, edit, delete, and PDF export features using multiple hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersTab.tsx: Handles viewing, creating, and deleting general reminders with form validation and identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Displays VLOOKUP, filter, and update-checking results with row editing and export to Excel/PDF including filtering.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides VLOOKUP and filter search tools on workbook data, recording history and updating shared app state.
frontend/src/pages/TodoTab.tsx: Manages a to‑do list with create and toggle actions, including dialogs, validation, and identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: UI for uploading a new Excel file, selecting a key column, and comparing it with the current workbook to detect new items and record history.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Handles uploading and parsing Excel workbooks, selecting sheets, updating app state, and recording upload history.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state for workbooks, search, filtering, comparisons, history, and exposes setters and normalization logic.
frontend/src/utils/assets/resolveAssetUr: Builds a full asset URL by combining the base path with a cleaned asset path.
frontend/src/utils/attendance/configMapp: Provides helpers for converting attendance time units, validating attendance config, and constructing AttendanceConfig objects.
frontend/src/utils/errors/userFriendlyEr: Maps various backend or mutation errors to simplified user-facing messages while logging full details.
frontend/src/utils/number/parseNatBigInt: Parses and validates numeric strings into bigint Nat values and provides input validation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/principal/parsePrinci: Safely parses and validates Principal IDs from strings or objects and exposes a type guard for Principal validity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state and requirements for fixing character preview centering and preventing clipping in the UI.
